entry.tran: 寻找者;寻求者;追求者;谋求者
entry.def: A seeker is someone who is looking for or trying to get something.

example.ex: I am a seeker after truth...
The beaches draw sun-seekers from all over Europe.
example.tran: 这些海滩吸引了欧洲各地喜欢晒太阳的人。

means.word_mean: 1. someone making a search or inquiry;
2. a missile equipped with a device that is attracted toward some kind of emission (heat or light or sound or radio waves)
